add_recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs
add_recipes.directions: Whisk eggs, milk, salt. Cook in butter.

add_recipes.title: Pasta Salad
add_recipes.ingredients:
250g pasta
1 cucumber, diced
1 bell pepper, diced
10 cherry tomatoes, halved
50g feta cheese
Olive oil dressing
add_recipes.directions:
1. Cook pasta
2. Chop vegetables
3. Combine ingredients
4. Toss with dressing

add_recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
add_recipes.ingredients:
1 onion
2 carrots
2 celery stalks
4 cups vegetable broth
1 can diced tomatoes
1 cup mixed vegetables
Salt and pepper
add_recipes.directions:
1. Saut√© onion, carrots, celery
2. Add broth and tomatoes
3. Simmer
4. Add mixed vegetables
5. Season to taste
